According to the report, the increased prevalence of eye disorders is one of the major drivers of contact lens market. Lifestyle changes, including the rising use of electronic devices, have resulted in an increase in eye disorders, especially among the youth. Convenience is another factor. Contact lenses are preferred over eyeglasses for comfort and convenience. Further, the report states that a few factors could drag down the market's growth. Product recalls will have a negative impact on contact lens market. Another challenge is the availability of alternative treatment methods such as refractive surgery. Refractive surgery reshapes the retina and reduces a person's dependency on contact lenses.
